EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners (1312207519.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1312207519.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Bill,
This is great news. I will take care of the W9. You’ll want to get your Business Center all set-up with MBO, which you have completed the online portion. The only part that I need back is the I9 Form. You’ll find that on page 13 of this packet. There is an example on the page before on how it should be completed. You’ll need to have a notary sign in section 2 and you sign in second 1. Since you are using a passport, you’ll need to include a clear copy of that photo ID when you fax this back in. Please let me know if you have any questions.
Regards,
Steve
From: Bill Ferguson [mailto:ferguson3@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, July 29, 2011 10:14 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Steve,
It's a go for my first contract. Per your request, I will copy you in with the engagement manager, Marla Ravkind at General Datatech. The bill rate is $125/hour. Travel expenses and international communication expenses are to be reimbursed. For this project, the client is booking the flight and hotel.
They asked me to fill out a W9. Is this appropriate?
Thanks,
Bill Ferguson On Thu, Jul 28, 2011 at 10:52 AM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: William,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few items we spoke about
1. Expense policy
2. Expense list (most common types of expenses you can submit through us)
3. Link to our group benefit plan details: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits
4. Estimate showing you what your income would look like running through MBO
5. Summary of benefits
I’ll follow up with you next week. I’ll have my fingers crossed for you and MBO on this contract J
Steve
Steven Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment and Market Development O:703.793.6011 | M:540.560.8837 | F:703.793.6081 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive #300 Herndon, VA 20171 sarhancet@mbopartners.com www.mbopartners.com
-- Bill Ferguson ferguson3@gmail.com
